title: "How Afrofuturism in AI art is exposing biases in the system"
excerpt: "However, Do Nascimento’s imagination carries these Afrofuturistic works – without his proficiency in design and architectural ideas, AI’s visuals would be futile. His work can be found on his Instagram, where his latest exploration of fashion inspired by the Maasai tribe garnered more than 30,000 views."
